sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import PayPalButton from './PayPalButton' export default function Totals({value,history}) { const{cartSubTotal,cartTotal,cartTax,clearCart} = value return (
subtotal : $ {cartSubTotal}
tax : $ {cartTax}
total : $ {cartTotal}
) }
